data.name: VRealistic Fight: Aim For The Chest
data.detailed_description:
A simple 4 player pvp game with different mechanics: decide whether to shoot to kill or hurt your opponent.
It is the year 2140, a world-scale war has started and the enemy union has decided to use reality distortion technology to finish off the allied troops.
You are a soldier who has been affected by distortion fields, and it is your goal to escape from a new reality that you do not know.
The distortion techniques caused you to see multiple copies of yourself, to the point of not knowing who the real you is.
data.about_the_game:
A simple 4 player pvp game with different mechanics: decide whether to shoot to kill or hurt your opponent.
It is the year 2140, a world-scale war has started and the enemy union has decided to use reality distortion technology to finish off the allied troops.
You are a soldier who has been affected by distortion fields, and it is your goal to escape from a new reality that you do not know.
The distortion techniques caused you to see multiple copies of yourself, to the point of not knowing who the real you is.
data.short_description: A casual multiplayer pvp game where you can incapacitate your opponents and get a bigger advantage over them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3100 / Intel Core i3-10100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 / Intel Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
